Title: O chyom eshchyo govoryat muzhchiny
Writer: Leonid Barats, Aleksandr Demidov, Rostislav Khait, Sergey Petreykov
Actors: Elena Babenko, Leonid Barats, Anatoliy Belyy, Sergey Burunov
Plot: Four friends are forced to stay put in a radio station on New Year's Eve after one of them gets into trouble. They use the opportunity to remember memories from the past, talk about women, music, and decisions they had faced in their lives.
